description: Metrics from Argo Workflows compatible with multi-Prometheus origins like Thanos.

panels.title: Workflows by Phase in the last $ts

targets.expr:
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase) (argo_workflows_total_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns",phase!~"(Error|Failed)"})[1m:1m]) > 0 unless
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase) (argo_workflows_total_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns",phase!~"(Error|Failed)"})[1m:1m] offset 1h)
or
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase) (argo_workflows_total_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns",phase!~"(Error|Failed)"})[1m:1m]) > 0 -
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase) (argo_workflows_total_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns",phase!~"(Error|Failed)"})[1m:1m] offset 1h)

increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase) (argo_workflows_total_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns",phase=~"(Error|Failed)"})[1m:1m]) > 0 unless
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase) (argo_workflows_total_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns",phase=~"(Error|Failed)"})[1m:1m] offset 1h)
or
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase) (argo_workflows_total_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns",phase=~"(Error|Failed)"})[1m:1m]) > 0 -
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase) (argo_workflows_total_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns",phase=~"(Error|Failed)"})[1m:1m] offset 1h)

sum by (prometheus, namespace, queue_name) (rate(argo_workflows_queue_latency_sum{prometheus="prometheus/runner-prometheus"}[1m]))
/
  sum by (prometheus, namespace, queue_name) (rate(argo_workflows_queue_latency_count{prometheus="prometheus/runner-prometheus"}[1m]))

panels.title: Time objects spend waiting in the queue

targets.expr:
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_workflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m]) > 0 unless
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_workflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m] offset 1d)
or
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_workflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m]) > 0 -
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_workflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m] offset 1d)

increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_clusterworkflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m]) > 0 unless
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_clusterworkflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m] offset 1d)
or
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_clusterworkflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m]) > 0 -
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace, phase, name) (argo_workflows_clusterworkflowtemplate_triggered_total{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m] offset 1d)

increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace) (argo_workflows_pod_pending_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m]) > 0 unless
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace) (argo_workflows_pod_pending_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m] offset 1d)
or
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace) (argo_workflows_pod_pending_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m]) > 0 -
increase(sum by (prometheus, namespace) (argo_workflows_pod_pending_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[1m:1m] offset 1d)

topk (5, (increase(sum by (reason, prometheus, namespace) (argo_workflows_pod_pending_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[$ts:1m]) > 0)) unless
topk (5, (increase(sum by (reason, prometheus, namespace) (argo_workflows_pod_pending_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[$ts:1m] offset 1d)))
or
topk (5, (increase(sum by (reason, prometheus, namespace) (argo_workflows_pod_pending_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[$ts:1m]) > 0)) -
topk (5, (increase(sum by (reason, prometheus, namespace) (argo_workflows_pod_pending_count{prometheus=~"^$dc$",namespace=~"$ns"})[$ts:1m] offset 1d)))

panels.title: Top 5 Pending Pods by reason in the last $ts

options.content:
---

[![Pipekit Logo](https://helm.pipekit.io/assets/pipekit-logo.png)](https://pipekit.io?utm_campaign=grafana-dashboard)

Pipekit is the control plane for Argo Workflows. Platform teams use Pipekit to manage data & CI pipelines at scale, while giving developers self-serve access to Argo. Pipekit's unified logging view, enterprise-grade RBAC, and multi-cluster management capabilities lower maintenance costs for platform teams while delivering a superior devex for Argo users.

For help with Argo Workflows metrics, and overall Argo support, contact the Pipekit team at [hello@pipekit.io](mailto:hello@pipekit.io).

title: Argo Workflows Metrics - (v3.6 and above)
